name: Kirill
about_desc: Hello! My name is Cherkasov Kirill and i am a professional system administrator and python developer. I was born in 1987
in Yekaterinburg, Russia, where i grew up. After graduating from school, I entered the Ural State University named after
A.M. Gorky to the faculty of Mathematics and Mechanics (speciality: computer science). After graduating
from university, worked in several organizations (experience section) specializing in system administration.
In the past few years, I was fascinated by the development of software on the python, and have several own projects.
In my spare time I like to go in for sports: I go to the gym and play basketball.
